Post.title: jQeury -
Post._content:
##  jQuery

### 

- `#id` id,  `$('#test')`
- `.class` , `$('.test')`
- `element` , `$('div')`
- `*` , `$('*')`
- `selector1, select2,...,selectN` $('div, span, p.myClass')

<!--more-->

### 

- `$('ancestor decendant')` 
- `$('parent > child')` 
- `$('prev + next')` `prev``next`: `$('.one + div')``one``div`
- `$('prev ~ siblings')` prevsiblings`$('#two ~ div')``two``div`

### 

- `:first`  `$('div:first')`div
- `:last` 
- `:not(selector)` `$('input:not(.myClass)')`,`class``myClass``input`
- `:even` **0**
- `:odd` 
- `:eq(index)` 
- `:gt(index)` 
- `:lt(index)` 
- `:header`  `$(':header')``<h1>,<h2>,<h3>;....`
- `:animated`  `$('div:animated')``div`
- `:focus`  `$(':focus')`

### 

- `:contains(text)` text, `$('div:contains("")')`,```div`
- `:empty` , `$('div:empty')``div`
- `:has(selector)` `$('div:has(p)')``p``div`
- `:parent`  `$('div:parent')`,`div`

### 

- `:hidden` , `$(':hidden')`, `$('input:hidden')`input
- `:visible` 

### 

- `[attr]` , `$('div[id]')`, `id`
- `[attr=val]` `attr``val`, `$('div[title=test]')``title``test``div`
- `[attr!=val]` `attr``val`
- `[attr^=val]` `attr``val`
- `[attr$=val]` `attr``val`
- `[attr*=val]` `attr``val`
- `[attr|=val]` `attr``val``val-`
- `[attr~=val]` `attr``' val'`val
- `[attr1][attr2][attrN]` `$('div[id][title$="test"]')`idtitletestdiv

### 

- `:nth-child(index/even/odd/equation)` `index`
- `:first-child` `$('ul li:first-child')`, ulli
- `:last-child` 
- `:only-child` `$('ul li:only-child')`lili

### 

- `:enabled` `$('#form1 :enabled')`,`id``form1`
- `:disbaled` 
- `:checked` ()`$('input:checked')`,`input`
- `:selected` `$('select option:seleted')`

### 

- `:input` `<input>,<textarea>,<select>,<button>``$('#form1 :input')`
- `:text` 
- `:password` 
- `:radio` 
- `:submit` 
- `:image` 
- `:reset` 
- `:button` 
- `:file` 
- `:hidden`
